cleaned_text: Don't Miss Out on the Latest Updates. Subscribe to Our Newsletter for a simple and quick therapy that will get rid of back ache? The answer to your question is patra pinda sveda. An ancient practice in Ayurveda, it is still considered as one of the best and natural therapies to help a person stay healthy and rid them of ailments. The entire treatment is done with herbal oil instead of milk. Not only does it take care of a back aches, but also keeps your body youthful, radiant and very flexible. If you are suffering with sprains, spondylosis or muscle pain of any kind, do give this therapy a try. Here's all you need to know about this therapy. Patra pinda sveda is a form of massage that is similar to pinda sveda or [n](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/ayurvedic-treatment-what-to-expect-in-njavarakizhi-238812/) [javarakizhi](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/ayurvedic-treatment-what-to-expect-in-njavarakizhi-238812/), the only difference being that this treatment uses herbs along with rice. The most common herbs used are nirgundi, shigru, arka, eranda and shireesha. But the kind of herb that is used is based on the Ayurvedacharya's recommendation and the condition the massage is being used for. How does Patra Pinda Sveda work? The treatment is quite simple; herbs are chosen (depending on the type of ailment you have), tied into a bundle, and dipped into a herbal oil. Once ready, you will be asked to lie down and the technicians start the massage. The procedure is guided by a Ayurvedacharya and you will be made to change positions so that every muscle in your body is massaged. Since the aim of patra pinda sveda is to cause sweating, the massage goes on till it happens. Benefits of Patra Pinda Sveda The main function of this therapy is to help relieve backaches, but patra pinda sveda has a number of other benefits as well, here are some of the most common ones. Reduces back pain Patra pinda sveda is most often recommended for people with chronic back pain, arthritis, stiffness of the joints and even muscle pain, but what makes it perfect for these conditions is the fact that when your body is massaged with warmed herbs with deep tissue stimulation, it helps increase blood circulation to the affected area, gets rid of dosha imbalances, strengthens the muscles in the area, helps the release of toxins and reduces inflammation. Helps rejuvenate you If you are in search of a proper body massage that will relax you completely, then patra pinda sveda is the one for you. It will strengthen your back and spine and rejuvenate you from head to toe. This also helps tone muscles and improve the working of tissues within your body. Beats stress This form of massage helps the body and mind relax. It is also a great way to get rid of built up toxins in your body. What makes patra pinda sveda special is the fact that it can completely de-stress you, and helps your body recover from the damage that stress has caused.
